name: ARAIGNEES
description:
>Follow the fever dream of an industrial worker who gets bitten by a small spider that plunges each night into nightmare...



Atmospheric Horror, First-Person Adventure.
>Inspired by PS1 era aesthetic with pixel art textures mixing 2D and 3D for an immersive environmental storytelling.
FEATURE
>Explore the darkness of a spider nest.
>Linear storyline
>Hide from spiders of various sizes...
>Try to stay awake through this nightmare to understand what's happening.
>Solves puzzle and Mazes
>Use your environment to reach certain areas.
>Short and sweet, around 1-2 hours of gameplay.
>All the musics are made by Faerie Sound Studio & MauditeTentacule
>If you hate spider ... you know what to do.


This game is the introduction for my solo project ARAIGNEES, 100% indie.
